resources.string:
Edit the year, make, model, and hourmeter values in the corresponding fields.

Selecting 'clear form' from the toolbar menu above will clear the text fields but will not affect the profile image.

*The updated information is only recorded if the save icon is selected in the toolbar above.*

Touching the profile image area will display a prompt to either take a picture or to select an image from your phone's gallery. *Permissions are required for this action.*

Select 'delete profile' from the toolbar menu to permanently remove this profile from the app.

Edit the task name/title, interval (hrs.), and the hourmeter value of when the task was last completed in the corresponding fields. \n\nSelecting \'clear form\' from the toolbar menu above will clear the text fields.

Select the + icon in the toolbar menu above to create a new motorcycle profile.

You can switch between profiles by swiping left/right or by using the tabs near the top of the screen.

Touch anywhere in the main view to interact with the corresponding profile.

Quick links can be found at the bottom of the screen. Quick links from left to right are:

	MAINTENANCE (wrench icon) - create, view, and interact with maintenance tasks for the selected profile.

	POST-RIDE (stopwatch icon) - update the profile's current hourmeter reading. This action updates the hours remaining for all tracked maintenance tasks and resets the pre-ride inspections.

	PRE- RIDE (checklist clipboard) - populate, view, and interact with the pre-ride inspection checklist.

	NOTES / SPECS (data clipboard) - a simple notepad to record desired notes, specs, torques, inspection criteria, etc.

You can edit/delete a profile by touching the pencil icon in the top right corner of the profile view, to the right of the profile title. A profile image can be added/edited by touching the outlined image view in the 'Edit Profile' screen.
Supply the inspection name/title and select the check mark to add an inspection to the checklist.\n\nSelect the back arrow or the cancel(x) button to abort and return to the previous screen.

Enter the motorcycle's year, make, model and current hourmeter reading in the corresponding fields.

Touch the check mark to save the profile to the database.

A profile image can be added after the profile is created by touching the profile image area of the 'edit profile' page.

Select the back arrow or the cancel(x) button to abort and return to the previous screen.

Enter the maintenance task's name/title, interval (hrs.), and the hourmeter value of when the task was last completed in the corresponding fields.

Touch the check mark to save the task to the database.

Select the back arrow or the cancel(x) button to abort and return to the previous screen.

Use this space to consolidate/maintain any profile specific information, e.g. maintenance steps, torque specs, dimensions, clearances, etc. 

Selecting 'clear' from the toolbar menu above will clear all notes.

*The updated information is only recorded if the save icon is selected in the toolbar above.*
Supply the new hourmeter reading and select the check mark to update the profile\'s current hours.\n\nSelect the back arrow or the cancel(x) button to abort and return to the previous screen.

Select the + icon in the toolbar menu above to create a new pre-ride inspection checklist item.

Checklist items can be removed by selecting 'delete item' or 'delete all' from the toolbar menu above.

When the profile's current hourmeter reading is updated in the post-ride screen the checklist items are reset.

If you do not wish to use the pre-ride inspection functionality, simply leave this list empty and the inspection status flag will not be set on the main profile selection page.

MAINTENANCE - create, view, and interact with maintenance tasks for the selected profile.

POST-RIDE - update the profile's current hourmeter reading.

PRE-RIDE - populate, view, and interact with the pre-ride inspection checklist.

NOTES / SPECS - record desired notes, specs, torques, inspection criteria, etc.

EDIT PROFILE - edit profile year, make, model, hours, and set or change the profile image. The profile can be deleted by selecting the option in the toolbar menu at the top of the edit profile screen.

The selected task can be signed off at any value up to the current hourmeter reading.

Simply enter the time (hourmeter value) the task was completed and touch the check-mark to submit. This will reset the task's interval, restarting the countdown.

Maintenance tasks can be edited or deleted by selecting the corresponding option in the toolbar menu above.

Select the + icon in the toolbar menu above to create a new maintenance task to be tracked.

Select an existing task to sign-off, edit, or delete that task.

The navigation tabs below will open the corresponding profile action pages.

Selecting the home tab will return to the profile select screen.
